accounts.name: lp_pool

instructions.name: append_verification_key_data
docs: Append verification key data to an existing account
Used for chunked upload of large VKs

accounts.name: verification_key
docs: Verification key account (must already be initialized)

accounts.name: verification_key
docs: Verification key (boxed to reduce stack usage)

accounts.name: token_pool
docs: Token pool (for verifying voting power) (boxed to reduce stack usage)

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool for the offer token (boxed to reduce stack usage)

accounts.name: verification_key
docs: Verification key (boxed to reduce stack usage)

accounts.name: maker_pool
docs: Maker's offer token pool (boxed to reduce stack usage)

accounts.name: taker_pool
docs: Taker's payment token pool (boxed to reduce stack usage)

accounts.name: verification_key
docs: Verification key (boxed to reduce stack usage)

accounts.name: finalizer
docs: Anyone can finalize once threshold is met

instructions.name: initialize_commitment_counter
docs: Initialize commitment counter for a pool
Must be called after initialize_pool to enable commitment tracking.

instructions.name: initialize_pool
docs: Initialize a new shielded pool for a token

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool account to initialize (boxed to reduce stack usage)

instructions.name: register_verification_key
docs: Register a verification key for a circuit

accounts.name: pool_a
docs: Token A pool (boxed to reduce stack usage)

accounts.name: pool_b
docs: Token B pool (boxed to reduce stack usage)

accounts.name: lp_pool
docs: LP token pool (boxed to reduce stack usage)

instructions.name: set_verification_key_data
docs: Set verification key data on an existing account
Used for large VKs that exceed transaction size limits

accounts.name: verification_key
docs: Verification key account (must already be initialized)

instructions.name: shield
docs: Shield tokens - deposit public tokens into the shielded pool
Uses Light Protocol compressed accounts for commitment storage.
The light_params enable on-chain commitment storage via Light Protocol.
The stealth_ephemeral_pubkey is stored so recipient can derive
the stealth private key for decryption.

accounts.name: pool
docs: Pool to shield into (boxed to reduce stack usage)

instructions.name: store_commitment
docs: Store a commitment as a Light Protocol compressed account
Called after transact to persist commitments on-chain.
Can be called in separate transactions to avoid size limits.

instructions.name: submit_encrypted
docs: Uses Light Protocol for action nullifier storage to prevent double-voting.

accounts.name: pool
docs: Token pool (boxed to reduce stack usage)

accounts.name: verification_key
docs: Verification key (boxed to reduce stack usage)

accounts.name: input_pool
docs: Input token pool (boxed to reduce stack usage)

accounts.name: output_pool
docs: Output token pool (boxed to reduce stack usage)

instructions.name: test_verify_proof
docs: Verifies a proof without pool state checks

instructions.name: transact
docs: Transact - private transfer with optional unshield
The light_params parameter enables Light Protocol compressed account
storage for nullifiers. If provided, a compressed account is created
to prevent double-spending. If None, legacy event-only tracking is used.
Commitments are emitted as events and can be stored separately via store_commitment.

accounts.name: verification_key
docs: Verification key for the circuit (boxed to reduce stack usage)

accounts.name: unshield_recipient
docs: Unshield recipient (optional, can be any account)

instructions.name: transact_adapt
docs: Transact via adapter - swap through external DEX

accounts.name: input_pool
docs: Input token pool (boxed to reduce stack usage)

accounts.name: output_pool
docs: Output token pool (boxed to reduce stack usage)

accounts.name: verification_key
docs: Verification key (boxed to reduce stack usage)

errors.name: InvalidMerkleRoot
errors.msg: Merkle root not found in current or historical roots

errors.name: NullifierAlreadySpent
errors.msg: Nullifier has already been spent (compressed account exists)

errors.name: ActionNullifierAlreadyUsed
errors.msg: Action nullifier has already been used (already voted)

errors.name: CommitmentCreationFailed
errors.msg: Failed to create commitment compressed account

types.name: AdapterRegistered
docs: Emitted when an adapter module is registered

fields.name: threshold
docs: Threshold required for decryption (t of n)

fields.name: action_domain
docs: Action domain for nullifiers (prevents cross-proposal voting)

fields.name: encrypted_tallies
docs: Encrypted vote tallies (one ElGamal ciphertext per option)
These are homomorphically summed as votes come in

fields.name: decryption_shares
docs: Decryption shares submitted by committee members

types.name: AggregationCreated
docs: Emitted when a voting aggregation is created

types.name: AggregationFinalized
docs: Emitted when voting results are finalized

types.name: AmmPool
docs: AMM pool for a token pair

fields.name: state_hash
docs: Current state hash (hash of reserves + lp_supply)
Used for ZK proof verification of state transitions

fields.name: reserve_a
docs: Reserve A (committed, updated via ZK proofs)

fields.name: reserve_b
docs: Reserve B (committed, updated via ZK proofs)

types.name: AmmPoolInitialized
docs: Emitted when AMM pool is initialized

types.name: AmmPoolStateChanged
docs: Emitted when AMM pool state changes

types.name: DecryptionShare
docs: Decryption share from a committee member

fields.name: c1
docs: C1 = r * G (32 bytes x, 32 bytes y compressed to 32)

fields.name: nullifier_proof
docs: Validity proof for nullifier (proves it doesn't exist)

types.name: LightAddLiquidityParams
docs: Parameters for Light Protocol operations in add liquidity

fields.name: nullifier_a_address_tree_info
docs: Address tree info for nullifier A

fields.name: nullifier_b_address_tree_info

fields.name: change_a_commitment_proof

fields.name: change_b_commitment_proof
docs: Validity proof for change B commitment

fields.name: change_b_commitment_address_tree_info
docs: Address tree info for change B commitment

types.name: LightAddressTreeInfo
docs: IDL-safe wrapper for Light Protocol address tree info
Contains tree configuration for compressed account address derivation.

fields.name: address_merkle_tree_pubkey_index
docs: Index of the address merkle tree pubkey in remaining_accounts

fields.name: address_queue_pubkey_index
docs: Index of the address queue pubkey in remaining_accounts

fields.name: root_index
docs: Root index for the merkle tree

fields.name: commitment_address_tree_info
docs: Address tree info for refund commitment

types.name: LightCommitmentParams
docs: Parameters for Light Protocol commitment creation

fields.name: address_tree_info
docs: Address tree info for compressed account address derivation

fields.name: output_tree_index
docs: Output state tree index for the new compressed account

types.name: LightFillOrderParams
docs: Parameters for Light Protocol operations in fill order

fields.name: escrow_nullifier_address_tree_info
docs: Address tree info for escrow nullifier

fields.name: taker_nullifier_address_tree_info
docs: Address tree info for taker nullifier

fields.name: maker_commitment_proof
docs: Validity proof for maker output commitment

fields.name: maker_commitment_address_tree_info
docs: Address tree info for maker output commitment

fields.name: taker_commitment_proof

fields.name: taker_commitment_address_tree_info
docs: Address tree info for taker output commitment

types.name: LightRemoveLiquidityParams
docs: Parameters for Light Protocol operations in remove liquidity

fields.name: lp_nullifier_address_tree_info
docs: Address tree info for LP nullifier

fields.name: out_a_commitment_proof

docs: Address tree info for output A commitment

fields.name: out_b_commitment_proof

types.name: LightSwapParams
docs: Parameters for Light Protocol operations in swap

fields.name: nullifier_address_tree_info
docs: Address tree info for input nullifier

fields.name: out_commitment_address_tree_info
docs: Address tree info for output commitment

fields.name: change_commitment_address_tree_info
docs: Address tree info for change commitment

types.name: LightTransactParams
docs: Parameters for Light Protocol combined validity proof
- Commitment exists (inclusion) - prevents fake commitment attacks

fields.name: validity_proof
docs: Combined validity proof (commitment inclusion + nullifier non-inclusion)

fields.name: nullifier_address_tree_info
docs: Address tree info for nullifier creation

types.name: LightValidityProof
docs: IDL-safe wrapper for Light Protocol validity proof
Contains the serialized proof data that can be deserialized
into a ValidityProof for Light CPI operations.

types.name: LightVoteParams
docs: Parameters for Light Protocol nullifier storage

fields.name: nullifier_proof
docs: Validity proof for action nullifier (proves it doesn't exist)

types.name: MerkleRootUpdated
docs: Emitted when merkle root is updated

types.name: NoteCreated
docs: Emitted when a new note is created (shield or transact output)

types.name: NoteSpent
docs: Emitted when a note is spent (nullifier revealed)

fields.name: order_id
docs: Unique order ID (derived from nullifier + terms)

fields.name: terms_hash
docs: Hash of order terms (offer_token, offer_amount, ask_token, ask_amount, maker_receive)

fields.name: encrypted_escrow
docs: Encrypted escrow note (for maker to decrypt)

types.name: OrderCancelled
docs: Emitted when an order is cancelled

types.name: OrderCreated
docs: Emitted when an order is created

types.name: OrderFilled
docs: Emitted when an order is filled

types.name: Pool
docs: Shielded pool for a single token
Note: Merkle tree state (commitments, roots) is now stored in Light Protocol
compressed accounts. The PoolCommitmentCounter tracks leaf indices.

types.name: PoolCommitmentCounter
docs: Pool commitment counter - tracks next leaf index
This is a regular PDA (not compressed) that tracks the
next available leaf index for each pool. Needed for

types.name: PoolInitialized
docs: Emitted when a new pool is initialized

types.name: StoreCommitmentParams
docs: Parameters for storing a single commitment

fields.name: leaf_index
docs: Leaf index (read from commitment counter before transact)

fields.name: stealth_ephemeral_pubkey
docs: Stealth ephemeral pubkey for deriving decryption key (64 bytes: X + Y)
If all zeros, decrypt with original spending key (internal operations)

fields.name: encrypted_note
docs: Encrypted note data (Vec to avoid heap issues during deserialization)

fields.name: validity_proof
docs: Validity proof for the commitment address (non-inclusion)

fields.name: vk_data
docs: Format: alpha_g1 (64) + beta_g2 (128) + gamma_g2 (128) + delta_g2 (128) + ic_len (4) + ic (64 * ic_len)

types.name: VerificationKeyRegistered
docs: Emitted when a verification key is registered

types.name: VoteSubmitted
docs: Emitted when an encrypted vote is submitted
